DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare three different core build-up material dental use . The study hypothesis difference survival rate different core build-ups .
DOC.detailed_description: Core build-ups replace dental structure decay caries tooth fracture . Often necessary insertion dental restoration . In clinical practice , two main material group : glass ionomer cement composite . Because good physical property composite material claim fulfill expect criterion core build-ups . However , composite core build-ups get lose insertion definite prosthetic restoration . The current prospective , randomize control study investigate survival rate three different composite material : `` Rebilda DC '' , `` Clearfil Core DC '' `` Multicore Flow '' . The statistical analysis perform logistic regression perform institute institute Medical Biometry Informatics , university heidelberg . The study hypothesis difference survival rate .
DOC.criteria: patient need single crown fix dental prosthesis patient able sign inform consent form , 18 year , pregnant woman insufficient oral hygiene
